page.title: 05Tuxford Comp. School 5
page.content:
own toilets and cloakroom facilities and entry to each wing is direct from the outside.
SPECIALIST AREAS
In addition to the ten classrooms, provision has been made in the design of the building for separate Science and Craft areas. These specialist facilities include a Science Laboratory, Metalwork and Woodwrk rooms, Domestic Science/Needlework room Pottery and Art area.
MEETING ROOM
This has been designed as a multi purpose room and is used for year assemblies, lead lessons, lectures, discussions, drama and some music. It is also used for films, and T.V.
